```{r load_lib, echo=FALSE}
library(yamat)
library(yamatClassifier)
```


# Data

```{r get_data}
# Download data
gse_acc <- "GSE97529"
data_dir <- "~/Downloads/GSE97529"
rgset <- yamat::get_gse(gse_acc, data_dir)
# Normalization
gmset <- yamat::normalize(rgset = rgset, norm_method = "funnorm")
# Save
save(rgset, file = file.path(data_dir, "rgset.Rda"))
```
